# The `GCStrategy` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy">GCStrategy</a> describes a garbage collector algorithm&#39;s code generation requirements, and provides overridable hooks for those needs which cannot be abstractly described. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::GCStrategy</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy">GCStrategy</a> describes a garbage collector algorithm&#39;s code generation requirements, and provides overridable hooks for those needs which cannot be abstractly described.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy">GCStrategy</a> objects must be looked up through the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>. The objects themselves are owned by the Context and must be immutable.

Definition at line 63 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h">GCStrategy.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getName() {#ae253aa14fb9f8582e089850f07616599}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const std::string &amp; llvm::GCStrategy::getName () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the name of the GC strategy.

This is the value of the collector name string specified on functions which use this strategy.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h/#l00088">88</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h">GCStrategy.h</a>.

### usesMetadata() {#a79b51aca35066f7e941e54bb504d8755}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::GCStrategy::usesMetadata () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
If set, appropriate metadata tables must be emitted by the back-end (assembler, JIT, or otherwise).

The default stackmap information can be found in the StackMap section as described in the documentation.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h/#l00118">118</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h">GCStrategy.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Protected Member Attributes

### NeededSafePoints {#a876df2ee9b43a6e37c7e25cdbc5ee458}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::GCStrategy::NeededSafePoints = false"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
If UseStatepoints is set, this determines whether the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rewritestatepointsforgc">RewriteStatepointsForGC</a> pass should rewrite this function&#39;s calls.

This should only be set if UseStatepoints is set. if set, calls are inferred to be safepoints

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h">GCStrategy.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::GCStrategy::UseRS4GC = false"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Uses gc.statepoints as opposed to gc.roots, if set, NeededSafePoints and UsesMetadata should be left at their default values.

## Statepoint Specific Properties

### isGCManagedPointer {#a6bbb5320403c4748de766cc6efc5e55e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual std::optional&lt; bool &gt; llvm::GCStrategy::isGCManagedPointer (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
If the type specified can be reliably distinguished, returns true for pointers to GC managed locations and false for pointers to non-GC managed locations.

Note a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy">GCStrategy</a> can always return &#39;std::nullopt&#39; (i.e. an empty optional indicating it can&#39;t reliably distinguish.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h/#l00101">101</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/gcstrategy-h">GCStrategy.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### useRS4GC {#a86859e2cfd56ae04d6baef2f512e22fd}

  prototype="bool llvm::GCStrategy::useRS4GC () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rewritestatepointsforgc">RewriteStatepointsForGC</a> pass should run on functions using this GC.

## GCRoot Specific Properties
